TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SFSpeechRecognizerAuthorizationStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumeration of the permission status of speech recognition.

remarks.para: Applications that use speech recognition must have an entry in their info.plist file with a key of NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription and a string value. The string value will be displayed in a standard system dialog after the developer calls .

example.code: <key>NSMicrophoneUsageDescription</key> <string>Your microphone will be used to record your speech when you press the "Start Recording" button.</string> <key>NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription</key> <string>Speech recognition will be used to determine which words you speak into this device's microphone.</string>
